did.abstract: Two membership receipts issued to Cyrus Pyle, one from the Long Island Historical Society (later the Brooklyn Historical Society), dating from 1867, and one from the Mercantile Library Association of Brooklyn, dating from 1868.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cyrus Pyle (1834-1909) was a resident of Brooklyn, N.Y., where he operated a chain of retail pharmacies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two membership receipts issued to Cyrus Pyle, one from the Long Island Historical Society (later the Brooklyn Historical Society), dating from 1867, and one from the Mercantile Library Association of Brooklyn, dating from 1868.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of George H. Gray, 1951 and 1955.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
